snippet: Ben Keesey, the head of the Invisible Children advocacy group, is responding to tough questions about his organization and its approach to its "Kony 2012" film, which has had more than 100 million views online.
abstract: Ben Keesey, the head of the Invisible Children advocacy group, is responding to tough questions about his organization and its approach to its "Kony 2012" film, which has had more than 100 million views online.
